controversies: Allegations of inappropriate content and interactions on the platform

Criticism over revenue-sharing model with developers
Unauthorized charges and poor handling of refund requests
social_issues: Child safety concerns and regulatory scrutiny

governance_issues: Dual-class share structure limiting shareholder influence
Legal settlements and exposure to intellectual property disputes

sources.title: Roblox Announces Massive Changes to Better Protect Children - VICE
sources.snippet: Amid a recent string of controversies, Roblox announced major changes to its child safety policies, giving parents more control. By Dwayne Jenkins October 24, 2024, 10:52am

sources.title: Roblox, accused of child safety concerns, to enact parental controls - WION
sources.snippet: Child safety changes. Roblox Corp. has said that it will be introducing more features aimed at improving child safety on its platform.
